# ip-notification

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                                                                                                                     | Type     | Default                                                        |
| -------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `description`  | `description`   | The alert description                                                                                                           | `string` | `'Describe the event and give further instructions if needed'` |
| `duration`     | `duration`      | The duration of the alert (Options: in seconds) - optional                                                                      | `string` | `undefined`                                                    |
| `iconSrc`      | `icon-src`      | The icon to display - optional                                                                                                  | `string` | `undefined`                                                    |
| `message`      | `message`       | The alert message                                                                                                               | `string` | `'Your success message'`                                       |
| `popDirection` | `pop-direction` | The direction the alert will display (Options: "left", "right") - optional                                                      | `string` | `undefined`                                                    |
| `state`        | `state`         | The alert state (Options: "success", "info", "warning", "error")                                                                | `string` | `'success'`                                                    |
| `triggerId`    | `trigger-id`    | The id to trigger the alert (Options: a button or link should have the attribute "data-trigger" with the trigger-id) - optional | `string` | `undefined`                                                    |

| Part      | Description |

| `"title"` |             |
